name: Starhopper MK1
description: The Starhopper MK1 is so ubiquitous and oft-copied, it's original manufacturer has lost copyright on it's name.  Being JUST durable enough to survive a pirate encounter, JUST fast enough to run away from anything more, and JUST enough cargospace to make a decent profit,  it has spread like an invasive species around the arms of the Galaxy- nary a quadrant is free of it's characterstic blue heatsink.
